CASE WHEN deadline < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') then 2 WHEN applicant >= "LIMIT" then 1 ELSE 0 END AS state from supporters su
where supporters_name like #{keyword}

mapper.insert: insert into supporters(num, writer, supporters_name, deadline, target, limit, applicant, start_date, end_date, content, reg_date) values(supo_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{supportersname}, #{deadline}, #{target}, #{limit}, #{applicant}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from supporters where supporters_name = #{input_name}

select s.num, s.supporters_name, s.deadline, s.target, s.limit, s.applicant, su.applicant_id, TO_CHAR(s.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')start_date, TO_CHAR(s.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')end_date,
CASE WHEN s.deadline < TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') then 2 WHEN s.applicant >= s.limit then 1 ELSE 0 END AS state
from supporters s inner join supporters_apply su on s.num = su.join_num where su.state = 0
and su.applicant_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
